content.content: 1. The following diseases are prescribed for the purposes of the definition of “designated diseases” in section 1 of the Act: 1. Meningococcal disease. 2. Pertussis. 3. Varicella. O. Reg. 261/13, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. The following diseases are prescribed for the purposes of the definition of “designated diseases” in section 1 of the Act:

1. Meningococcal disease.

2. Pertussis.

3. Varicella. O. Reg. 261/13, s. 1.

content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 261/13, s. 2.   Français
content.raw_html:
2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 261/13, s. 2.
